Revāyat Kāvus Māhyar Unvala, 1922p. 455:
maʿlum dasturān-e in-ǧāneb bude bāšand ke beh-din kāvus hum ṭalab nemud ǧahat-e dindārān ferestāde-ʾim bāyad ke dar ān-ǧāneb dasturi afzudan be-vāǧ dar-e hum gošudan vaqt-e yazešn se gere gereftan va be-dast-e čap gereftan aṣ̌əm. vōhū. sə̄. frauuarāne. *gāh ī hāwan´ tā sar hōmahe. aṣ̌auua. zaŋ́hō. xšnaoϑra. tā maraotū. aṣ̌əm. vōhū. se guftan
The Dasturs of this quarter have been informed that Behdin Kaus (Mahyar) asked for some Hom. We have sent some for those pious persons (i.e., the Indian congregation). It is necessary that (this Hom should be stocked up in Dar-i Meher, and when wanted) a priest should perform the Kusti ritual and with the Vāj, should open the lid of the Hom-vessel and for the Yasna, three pieces should be taken and should be taken with the left hand. (Dhabhar, 1932, pp. 418-9)
